meanings.definition: A male fertility god in ancient Greek mythology.
meanings.sent1: In ancient Greek stories, Priapus was known as a male fertility god.
meanings.sent2: People in ancient times believed in Priapus as a god of fertility.
meanings.sent3: The tale of Priapus, the male fertility god, always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Just like Priapus in mythology, he seemed to bring life and growth wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The image of Priapus as a fertility god is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A representation of the male reproductive organ, especially as a symbol of fertility.
meanings.sent1: The statue of Priapus in the garden was a symbol of fertility.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, Priapus statues are believed to bring fertility.
meanings.sent3: The quirky Priapus statue in the park always makes me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The Priapus symbol of fertility stood tall and proud in the field.
meanings.sent5: The Priapus figure was a clear sign of fertility and abundance.

meanings.definition: A plant genus in the family Orchidaceae.
meanings.sent1: The Priapus orchid is a beautiful flower in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Gardening enthusiasts love to cultivate Priapus plants.
meanings.sent3: I planted a Priapus orchid in my backyard, and it's thriving!
meanings.sent4: The Priapus orchid bloomed with vibrant colors in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the Priapus orchid caught everyone's attention.
